question:
Recently, a draft code has been prepared by the Labour Ministry. Which of the following is are correct statements with regard to this?
  1. It aims to cover agricultural workers along with self-employed people for the first time under the social security scheme
  2. It envisages registering all workers and employers through Aadhaar-based registration system
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Recently, a draft code has been prepared by the Labour Ministry. The draft code envisages the constitution of a national social security council to regulate the social security schemes of the centre and states. The proposed functions of the council include regulating the social security schemes of the centre, state governments and local bodies. The council would also coordinate between the centre and states and regulate the funds administered by the central and state boards. The scheme intends to cover agricultural workers along with self-employed people and target to provide social security benefits to 45 crore workers. It aims to register all workers and employers through Aadhaar-based registration system.
